title: ENG Vs SL, 2nd Test, Day 1 Match Preview, Dream11 Tips
body:
England is set to face Sri Lanka in the 2nd Test, Day 1 Match on August 29, 2024. The match will take place at Lord’s, London, starting at 03:30 PM IST. Both teams will be eager to start the series with a win, making this an exciting showdown.

ENG vs SL MATCH DETAILS:

England vs Sri Lanka, Test HEAD TO HEAD:

ALSO READ: Top 5 knocks of Major League Cricket 2024

ENG vs SL WEATHER REPORT:

Lord’s London Pitch Report:

The pitch at Lord’s, London usually helps both batsmen and bowlers but especially batters. Batsmen may do well early on, but fast bowlers could get more help as the game goes on. The match should be competitive if teams adjust to the pitch.

Match Performance:

England vs Sri Lanka PLAYING 11:

England (ENG): Daniel Lawrence, Ben Duckett, Ollie Pope (c), Joe Root, Harry Brook, Jamie Smith (wk), Chris Woakes, Gus Atkinson, Matthew Potts, Mark Wood, Shoaib Bashir

Sri Lanka (SL): Dimuth Karunaratne, Nishan Madushka, Kusal Mendis, Angelo Mathews, Dinesh Chandimal (wk), Dhananjaya de Silva (c), Kamindu Mendis, Prabath Jayasuriya, Asitha Fernando, Vishwa Fernando, Milan Priyanath Rathnayake

title: Glenn Maxwell News : Read all Latest and Breaking News of Glenn Maxwell – NDTV Sports
body:
Watch: Australian Players Spill It All In Lie Detector Test; Glenn Maxwell's Secrets Out

Australian cricketers Travis Head, Marnus Labuschagne, Mitchell Marsh, Pat Cummins, Usman Khawaja and Josh Hazlewood went through a funny lie detector test.

Steve Smith Shines As Washington Freedom Clinch Major League Cricket 2024 Title

Washington Freedom etched their name on the Major League Cricket (MLC) 2024 trophy with a massive 96-run victory over the San Francisco Unicorns

Watch: Andre Russell Breaks Travis Head's Bat In MLC Match. Australia Star's Reaction Is Viral

Washington Freedom defeated Los Angeles Knight Riders by eight wickets to register their third consecutive victory of the 2024 Major League Cricket (MLC) on Sunday.

IND vs AUS Highlights, T20 World Cup 2024 Super Eight: India Qualify For Semi-Finals With 24-Run Win

T20 World Cup 2024, IND vs AUS Highlights: India became the third team following South Africa and England to make it to the semi-finals of the ongoing mega event.

Australia Star Usman Khawaja Hails "Inspirational" Afghanistan Amid 'Human Rights' Controversy

In 2023 and 2024, Cricket Australia had cancelled a planned bilateral series against Afghanistan, citing "deteriorating human rights" towards women and children as the reason.
